name: Water Spirits
description:
summons and launch a Water Spirit forward which heals allies within range of the Water Spirit. 

Water Spirits last 20 seconds or 30 heals. 

Water Spirits only heals each player a maximum of 5 times. 

Enemies hit by the water spirit suffer a 30% to Damage Bonus: Fire for 20 seconds.
shortDescription: Attack: Heal Allies; Reduce Enemy Fire Damage
